Functions
00600_MixedCATA2TA_McRegistry
GP_030_TAModes

Functions

 TestCase_GC00100_MonoSession_McRegistry () mc_mono_session)
 
 TestCase_GC00200_MonoSessionKeepAlive_McRegistry () mc_mono_session_keep_alive)
 
 TestCase_GC00300_MultiSessionOneSessionOnly_McRegistry () mc_multi_session)
 
 TestCase_GC00305_MultiSession_McRegistry () mc_multi_session)
 
 TestCase_GC00310_MultiSession_McRegistry_OpenClose () mc_multi_session)
 
 TestCase_GC00400_MultiSessionKeepAlive_OneSessionOnly_McRegistry () mc_multi_session_keep_alive)
 
 TestCase_GC00405_MultiSessionKeepAlive_McRegistry () mc_multi_session_keep_alive)
 
 TestCase_GC00410_MultiSessionKeepAlive_McRegistry_OpenClose () mc_multi_session_keep_alive)
 
 TestCase_GC00500_MultiInstance_McRegistry () mc_multi_instance)
 

Detailed Description

Description:
: This test intends to verify the behavior of TA properties "singleInstance", "multiSession" and "instanceKeepAlive" in stress situations when called by both the CA and a client TA.

The TAs are the same as for the other TA modes tests.

The CA will call a TA that then calls these TAs.

Setup: open session to the client TA

Teardown: close session to the client TA

Function Documentation

TestCase_GC00100_MonoSession_McRegistry ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
Check that a mono session TA configured with instanceKeepAlive=False can be opened from the mcRegistry, closed, and then is not openable by a TA client.
Test Steps:
Open the TA from the mcRegistry via the NWd Close the TA Open the TA from a client TA in the SWd Panic the TA to make sure it is unloaded
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
No
Final Device Testcase:
No
Extensive Testcase:
No
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No
Minimum Product Version required for this testcase:
400A
Test ID:
GP_030_TAModes.00600_MixedCATA2TA_McRegistry.GC00100_MonoSession_McRegistry

TestCase_GC00310_MultiSession_McRegistry_OpenClose ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
Check that a mono session TA configured with instanceKeepAlive=True can be opened from the mcRegistry, and then opened again by a TA client.
Test Steps:
Open the TA from the mcRegistry via the NWd Open the TA from a client TA in the SWd Close the NWd session Open a second session from the SWd Close all sessions Open a new session from the SWd, which should return TEE_ERROR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND

TestCase_GC00500_MultiInstance_McRegistry ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
Check that a multi-instance TA configured with instanceKeepAlive=False can be opened from the mcRegistry, but is not openable by a TA client.
Test Steps:
Open the TA from the mcRegistry via the NWd Close the TA Open the TA from a client TA in the SWd Panic the TA to make sure it is unloaded
